response.overview: A queer Aeta student defy adversity by finding passion through photojournalism, balancing studies, and taking part of a community-driven learning center, shedding light on the solidarity of a marginalized indigenous community determined to protect their ancestral land from displacement threats through education. In Sitio Kalangitan (Barrio Heaven), where Singoy resides, life could not be further from the heavens. This is why education holds such great importance in their hearts.
response.title: Singoy (Diwata ng Sitio Kalangitan)
